Class Zombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.Zombie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Capable, Printable, ActorInterface, ZombieWorld

    public class Zombie
extends ZombieActor
    A Zombie. This Zombie is pretty boring. It needs to be made more interesting.
    Author:
    ram

        public Weapon getWeapon()

      • playTurn

        public Action playTurn(Actions actions,
                       Action lastAction,
                       GameMap map,
                       Display display)
        If a Zombie can attack, it will. If not, it will chase any human within 10 spaces. If no humans are close enough it will wander randomly. The Zombie will drop its limbs if it lost any as a result of an attack on it. A Zombie is also able to say a "Zombie-like" phrase.
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        display - the Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed

      • knockOffLimb

        public java.lang.String knockOffLimb(GameMap map)
        Knocks off a Zombie's limbs. Knocks off at least one limb from the Zombie & drops it at the Zombie's current location or a location adjacent to it. Use this method to determined the number of limbs knocked off & drop the limb as a result of an attack on it.
        Parameters:
        map - the map where the current Zombie is.
        Returns:
        a description of the Zombie limbs knocked off.
